column4: Support RSpec 3
Fix duplicate invalid requests
Fixnum is deprecated in upcoming ruby version
Add config support for ssl_version and ssl_cipher_list.
Do not wait indefinitely for process to finish
Add executable bit for example shebang files
Ensure the request is closed in the same thread as the app
For clusters, allow --wait to be passed down
Fix test suite for the case /etc/rc.d exists.
Add support for grouping cluster restarts
allow ERB templates in config files
Revert "remove eventmachine restriction"
remove eventmachine restriction
Don't need "int cs" variable here
TCP/IP Backend reports incorrect port when asked to bind to 0
fix thin start change log
Work with ruby 2.3's --enable-frozen-string-literal
Fix pluralization and typos in docs
Set $USER and $HOME when running as another user
Add a link to the GitHub profile of Zed Shaw
Allow Rack versions higher than 1.0
Mac OS X / BSD Kqueue Support
initialize `@trace_logger` to nil
add :timeout option for Rack::Server.new
When restarting, exit on a next tick so we can send response back to a client
Fix doc typo
Add check pidfile empty. Fix Issue #34
Update eventmachine for ruby 2.2.0
Fix for issue 248
ignore emacs backup files in config_path
small refactoring
Remove version number from HTTP "Server" header.
Fix Re-allow me to turn off client cert verification with SSL (#235)
#226 add HTTP 422 status
Tempfiles created by a large request should be closed and deleted.
Added example config file and the thin command usage to the README
Increase REQUEST_PATH to 2048 symbols
Console log output
Fix Rakefile to prevent 'uninitialized constant CLEAN'
(Fixes #69) Remove --ssl-verify and provide peer_cert
Fix three typos in Thin::Request documentation
Enhance the logging subsystem.
ext/thin_parser: set LC_CTYPE to C
thin install - systemD support
Allow Thin to Start | Stop | Restart Single Config Files
Threadpool size setting
Fix condition for String#encode!
Fixes problem with connections requests keep-alive and thin
Thin 2
Force kill using already known pid
Rspec2 compatibilty
Keeps connections in a Hash to speedup deletion
Various modifications to the vlad example so we can use bundler and rvm
Replace obsolete Rake::RDocTask with RDoc::Task
Updated URLS
Added possibility to start, stop and restart only one instance
Fix JRuby key
Add language for Travis
Allow rbx to fail in 1.8 & 1.9 modes
added some exception handling to catch IO errors
Case insensitive header access
Replace HTTP_STATUS_CODES list with Rack's IANA-derived list
Ignore Content-Length header case in response
Make proper response on exception
Automatically close idling pipeline connections on server stop
Thin should not do nothing once there is an exception while parsing request
Added -q / --quiet command-line option.
change PID file ownership to match process ownership so stop can remove PID files
Allow compilation with -Werror=format-security option
Add site adapter.
Update rack/adapter.rb to support "site" adapter.
Fix #68: kill -USR1 $PROCESS_ID for log rotation
Squash warnigns for undefined vars in Base
make documentation easier to read on github with markdown
Http parser
Sample fix for #91
Restart thins one by one.
Pass RACK_ENV or RAILS_ENV back to Rack
Rails will never been choose as adapter for most of the rails apps
EXCEPTION: can't convert nil into String in Connection.socket_address
add a newline to log_error so the stack trace doesn't run into the next line
RDOC format to README file
Remove expanded path
BSD init support
Support 'Transfer-Encoding: chunked' for input data
rack specifies a way to stream static files
travis-ci.org setup
Add detection of Mac ruby version
Make set_content_length work for every valid rack spec. Couldn't find app
Logger#log_error prints to STDERR
removed Specification#has_rdoc= assignment, this method has been deprecat
Typo fix
Fix tests to at least run and finish on 1.9.2
New .gemspec
shut down gracefully when receiving SIGTERM
Handle 1xx status codes better by not closing the connection
Expose peer SSL cert in env
Adjusting unix socket permissions to be more open.
Removed harcoded ruby path
Tweaks to use Mongrel's parser directly
remove a few build/run artifacts from the gemspec
